sentence.Network_en: The distiller has aged all his whisky for more than ten years.

entry.tran: (采用蒸馏法的)酿酒者，酿酒公司
entry.def: A distiller is a person or a company that makes whisky or a similar strong alcoholic drink by a process of distilling.
